title: Shen taunt BUG
body: I am sorry I have not screen caps or videos but I thought I would at least post it up so someone can look into it if they can. I was playing a game with Shen today and I hit a few of my taunts one in particular fully hit I even saw the red taunt animation thing by their feet .. but for some reason it just didn't taunt them, they just kept walking away (this is a {{champion:236}} btw) Thought it would be worth looking  into. That's a pretty big problem if it does occur. Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you able to reproduce this reliably? (With steps for reproduction?)

If not then it's probably best to just assume it was a once off occurrence.

If however you can reproduce it reliably then I would recommend posting a thread in the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) over on NA, please be sure to read the "[How to report a game bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" sticky before posting.
